summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 55th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to Sand Point Way, and from East 65th Street to East 75th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13569 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
